solution:
```python
def calculate_score(noble_cards, frog_cards, kappa_cards, weasel_cards):
    frog_score = 0
    kappa_score = 0
    weasel_score = 0

    noble_cards = list(map(int, noble_cards.split()))
    noble_cards.reverse()

    for _ in range(12):
        frog_action = frog_cards.pop(0)
        if frog_action > 0 and frog_action <= len(noble_cards):
            noble_cards.insert(frog_action - 1, noble_cards.pop())
        else:
            frog_score += noble_cards.pop()

        kappa_action = kappa_cards.pop(0)
        if kappa_action > 0 and kappa_action <= len(noble_cards):
            noble_cards.insert(kappa_action - 1, noble_cards.pop())
        else:
            kappa_score += noble_cards.pop()

        weasel_action = weasel_cards.pop(0)
        if weasel_action > 0 and weasel_action <= len(noble_cards):
            noble_cards.insert(weasel_action - 1, noble_cards.pop())
        else:
            weasel_score += noble_cards.pop()

    return frog_score, kappa_score, weasel_score


noble_cards = input()
frog_cards = list(map(int, input().split()))
kappa_cards = list(map(int, input().split()))
weasel_cards = list(map(int, input().split()))

frog_score, kappa_score, weasel_score = calculate_score(noble_cards, frog_cards, kappa_cards, weasel_cards)

print(frog_score, kappa_score, weasel_score)
```
